مشتری ایک ایسا سیارہ ہے جو ٹھوس سطح رکھت: Does Jupiter have a solid surface? Jupiter solid surface

It has big storms like the Great Red Spot, which has been going for hundreds of years. Jupiter is a gas giant and doesn't have a solid surface. It is still unclear if deeper down, Jupiter has a central core of solid material or if it may be a thick, super-hot and dense soup.
Does Jupiter have a solid surface? Jupiter solid surface

As a gas giant, Jupiter doesn't have a true surface. The planet is mostly swirling gases and liquids. While a spacecraft would have nowhere to land on Jupiter, it wouldn't be able to fly through unscathed either.
مشتری ایک ایسا سیارہ ہے جس پر چلا جا سکت: Can humans walk on Jupiter? Is it possible to land on Jupiter?

Searching for solid ground But on Jupiter, the pressure is immense. As the layers of gas above you push down more and more, it's like being at the bottom of the ocean – but instead of water, you're surrounded by gas. The pressure becomes so intense that the human body would implode; you would be squashed.
Can humans walk on Jupiter? Is it possible to land on Jupiter?

As a gas giant, Jupiter doesn't have a true surface. The planet is mostly swirling gases and liquids. While a spacecraft would have nowhere to land on Jupiter, it wouldn't be able to fly through unscathed either.
